inputs.name: WorkingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the working directory where the git command should run. This directory is also the base path for resolving glob patterns entered in the source file / dependent files parameters. Working directory is optional and when not specified, task defaults to [System.DefaultWorkingDirectory](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/pipelines/build/variables?view=vsts&tabs=batch#predefined-variables) build variable.
